name: WDCC (World Data Center for Climate)
description: The WDCC is a climate data archive and catalog operated by DKRZ, focusing on Earth System and climate-related research data. It organizes data in a hierarchical structure with rich metadata and provides long-term archiving, DOI assignment for certain data collections, and quality assurance. It supports research communities in climate modeling and collaborates with international projects and organizations.
owner_name: DKRZ (Deutsches Klimarechenzentrum, German Climate Computing Center)
